remote-access.connect-remote-url-error:
Failed to connect to the repository.
The URL may be incorrect or the server may not be running.
remote-access.register-confirm:
You are connected to a remote repository. 
Do you want to register the test result in the remote repository?
remote-access.registering-testresults-error: Failed to register the test result.
remote-access.delete-warning: Do you want to delete the registered test result from the local repository?
remote-access.delete-error: Failed to delete the test result.
remote-access.register-delete-succeeded:
Registration of test results in the remote repository.
And deletion of test results in the local repository have been completed.

common.save_settings_failed: Failed to save settings. Please check permissions of the config file or disk capacity.
common.change_locale_failed: Failed to change locale. Please check permissions of the config file or disk capacity.

capture_control.client_side_capture_service_not_found: Failed to connect 'latteart-capture-cl' server. Please check if 'latteart-capture-cl' server is running.
capture_control.capture_socket_disconnected: Disconnected from 'latteart-capture-cl' server during capturing operations. Please click 'Start' button to resume capture.
capture_control.run_operations_socket_disconnected: Disconnected from 'latteart-capture-cl' server during replaying operations. Please click 'Replay' button to replay operations again.
capture_control.run_operations_failed: An error has occurred during replaying operations.
capture_control.capture_failed: An error has occurred during capturing operation.
capture_control.web_driver_not_ready: Failed to start WebDriver. Please check if a correct path to WebDriver is set.
capture_control.create_test_result_directory_failed: Failed to make test result directory . Please check if a correct path to the directory is set.
capture_control.test_result_directory_already_exists: A directory with the same name as the test result directory has already exists. Please specify a different directory.
capture_control.web_driver_version_mismatch: This version of WebDriver does not support the target browser. Please check WebDriver version.

operation_history.compress_operation_screenshot_failed: Failed to compress a screenshot while capturing an operation. Please check the compression command in the config file. If you don't need compression, please turn it off in image compression settings.
operation_history.compress_note_screenshot_failed: Failed to compress screenshot while capturing a note. Please check the compression command in the config file.
operation_history.resume_failed: Failed to load a test result.
operation_history.save_test_scripts_no_section_error: Aborted test script generation. There is no session including screen transitions.
operation_history.save_test_scripts_no_operation_error: Aborted test script generation. There is no recorded operation.
operation_history.update_test_result_failed: Failed to update test result. Please check permissions of the test result file or disk capacity.
operation_history.delete_test_result_failed: Failed to delete the test result.
operation_history.get_import_test_results_failed: Failed to get import file list.
operation_history.get_test_result_list_failed: Failed to get test result list.

test_management.illegal_test_management_data: Illegal format of test management data.
test_management.get_import_project_list_failed: Failed to get import file list.

import_export.import-test-result-not-exist: Test result information does not exist.

remote_access.upload-request-error: Failed to register the test result.
